title: Is "The Book of Mormon--a Book of God"? (Part 2)
description:
Mormonism, with its largest expression in the LDS Church, claims that the Book of Mormon is a book inspired by God; sometimes even more inspired than the Bible. Is this true? Is the Book of Mormon actual Christian Scripture? In this video, I look at an article put out by the Church's website and take it apart.

The article: https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/general-conference/2011/10/the-book-of-mormon-a-book-from-god?lang=eng&fbclid=IwAR3iM6jjsy8G65t3u2dMS_QH6fXrBPojm_jjLyOX8kLbbfe0db4jyrBacC4

This is episode 27 of my podcast.

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
